revisionDesc.tei:change: Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/gazetteer_levant-phd.TEIP5.xml) and to GeoNames IDs to placeNames without such references based on places mentioned in the authority file.
Added graphic for all pages linking to EAP.
Mapped elements from version 1 of the ODD to version 2

Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/bibliography_OpenArabicPE-periodicals.TEIP5.xml) and to OCLC (WorldCat) IDs to titless without such references based on biblStructs mentioned in the authority file (bibliography).
revisionDesc.change: Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/gazetteer_levant-phd.TEIP5.xml) and to GeoNames IDs to placeNames without such references based on places mentioned in the authority file.

Added references to local authority file (../data/tei/personography_OpenArabicPE.TEIP5.xml) and VIAF to persNames without such references based on persons in the local authority file. If the source persName did not contain any further TEI mark-up, this has been added from the local authority file.
Added automated xml:ids for every element that is a descendant of tei:text and had no existing xml:id following the pattern "name()_generate-id()".
Added automated page numbers as ns in addition to ed="print" and edRef="#edition_1" for everypb that was not of ed="shamela".
Added automated page numbers as ns in addition to ed="print" and edRef="#edition_1" for everypb that was not of ed="shamela".
Corrected biblStruct by sorting child elements in the correct order. Converted all n on biblScope to from and towith identical values.
Corrected biblStruct by moving all biblScope from imprint to monogr and by converting all n to from and towith identical values.
Added the xml:lang attribute to all nodes that lacked this attribute. The value is based on the closest ancestor.
Generated this file by automatic conversion from Sente XML

note.bibl: خطاب لمنشيء الحسناء القاه في حفلة جمعية الخدمة الوطنية في صيدا في ١١ اذار

div.head:
ما شاهدته
في مأوى العجز لرهبات الام الحزينة
